docs.snippet: David Beckham's bid for a Major League Soccer team suffered a setback on Tuesday when the city of Miami rejected his plan to build a downtown waterfront stadium on a site next to the Miami Heat basketball arena....
docs.lead_paragraph: David Beckham's bid for a Major League Soccer team suffered a setback on Tuesday when the city of Miami rejected his plan to build a downtown waterfront stadium on a site next to the Miami Heat basketball arena.

headline.main: Miami Rejects David Beckham's Waterfront Soccer Stadium
headline.print_headline: Miami Rejects David Beckham's Waterfront Soccer Stadium

docs.snippet: The Detroit Tigers will have to wait at least another day to try to snap out of their recent funk....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Detroit Tigers will have to wait at least another day to try to snap out of their recent funk.

headline.main: Tigers-White Sox Game Postponed by Rain
headline.print_headline: Tigers-White Sox Game Postponed by Rain

docs.snippet: Shelly Sterling will seek an emergency court order confirming her as owner of the Los Angeles Clippers in a bid to block her estranged husband from having any say in the team's $2 billion sale, a source with knowledge of the matter said on Tuesday...
docs.lead_paragraph: Shelly Sterling will seek an emergency court order confirming her as owner of the Los Angeles Clippers in a bid to block her estranged husband from having any say in the team's $2 billion sale, a source with knowledge of the matter said on Tuesday.

headline.main: Shelly Sterling to Seek Court Backing as LA Clippers Owner-Source
headline.print_headline: Shelly Sterling to Seek Court Backing as LA Clippers Owner-Source

docs.snippet: Bob Welch, the 1990 AL Cy Young Award winner with the Oakland Athletics and the last major leaguer to win at least 25 games in a season, has died. He was 57....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bob Welch, the 1990 AL Cy Young Award winner with the Oakland Athletics and the last major leaguer to win at least 25 games in a season, has died. He was 57.

headline.main: Former Cy Young Winner Bob Welch Dies at 57
headline.print_headline: Former Cy Young Winner Bob Welch Dies at 57
